docs.snippet: The steamship Star of the West from Aspinwall, with the California mail of Feb. 20, and $1,279,134 in treasure, arrived at this port yesterday afternoon. We have no news of importance to report. In the California Legislature, a bill to suppress mobs...
docs.lead_paragraph: The steamship Star of the West from Aspinwall, with the California mail of Feb. 20, and $1,279,134 in treasure, arrived at this port yesterday afternoon. We have no news of importance to report. In the California Legislature, a bill to suppress mobs and insurrections had been introduced, and had excited much angry discussion. It was specially aimed at the late Vigilance Committee.

docs.snippet: Hon. W. W. Drammond, late Justice of the Supreme Court in Utah, is now prostrate with bron chitis at his residence in Chicago. But little hope is entertained of his recovery, as he has not spoken distinctly for the last ten days. Judge D., in health,...
docs.lead_paragraph: Hon. W. W. Drammond, late Justice of the Supreme Court in Utah, is now prostrate with bron chitis at his residence in Chicago. But little hope is entertained of his recovery, as he has not spoken distinctly for the last ten days. Judge D., in health, was a bold party man, a fast friend of senator Douglas, and in all his social relations a kind hearted man, but to his enemies bitter and unrelenting.

docs.snippet: The Navy Department has received dispatches from Commodore ARMSTRONG, dated long Kong, Jan. 14. IIe reports everything now quiet in Canton, and all along the whole coast to Shanghae. He also says his health is still very feeble, and that he shall...
docs.lead_paragraph: The Navy Department has received dispatches from Commodore ARMSTRONG, dated long Kong, Jan. 14. IIe reports everything now quiet in Canton, and all along the whole coast to Shanghae. He also says his health is still very feeble, and that he shall leave for the United States on the arrival of Capt. TAYNALI.

headline.main: LATER FROM SALT LAKE.; Brigham Still Determined to Rebel. Memorial From the Legislature to Congress. Mormon Haraugues in the Tabernacle.

docs.lead_paragraph: We have received, by way of California, files of the Deseret News to the 7th of January inclusive. It is reported that BRIGHAM YOUNG has been instisating the Oregon Indians to rebel. He has offered to pay them a certain sum per head for every horse or mule they may capture and bring to him.

docs.snippet: Rev. Dr. STRONG, of Flatbush, has gone southwart, in the hope of regaining his health. A union prayer-meeting is held every afternoon, from 4 to 5 o'clock, in the Reformed Dutch Church, (Rev. Dr. PORTER'S,) Williamsburg, in which the congregations of...
docs.lead_paragraph: Rev. Dr. STRONG, of Flatbush, has gone southwart, in the hope of regaining his health. A union prayer-meeting is held every afternoon, from 4 to 5 o'clock, in the Reformed Dutch Church, (Rev. Dr. PORTER'S,) Williamsburg, in which the congregations of Rev. Dr. McLANE and Rev. Mr. WELLS join, together with all who choose to attend,
